question: They saw many fruits in the farm. The first picture is of an apple. Which picture is second?
In the market they saw traditional goods. The first picture is of a flower vase. Which picture is fourth?
At the farm they saw vegetables. The first picture is of a tomato plant. Which picture is sixth?
In the farm they saw animals. The first picture is of a cow. Which picture is seventh?
In the market they visited a jewellery shop that had a variety of items on display. The first picture is of a necklace. Which picture is ninth?
They took note of the unique vegetables they found. What is the ordinal number of 41?
After taking a long walk, they decided to count the number of vegetables they saw in the market. What is the ordinal number of 33?
After visiting the farm, they made a list of the plants they learned about. Which of the following is an ordinal number?
While exploring the market, they bought many items. Which of the following is an ordinal number that represents the items they bought?
Which of the following is not an ordinal number?
